channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tim Cook and Sundar Pichai are cowards
item.description: Since X's users started using Grok to undress women and children using deepfake images, I have been waiting for what I assumed would be inevitable: X getting booted from Apple's and Google's app stores. The fact that it hasn't happened yet tells me something serious about Silicon Valley's leadership: Tim Cook and Sundar Pichai are […]

item.title: If You Love ‘Cloud Atlas,’ You’ve Got to See This New Documentary
item.description: The new 4K release has an excellent, star-studded, two-hour look back at the film.

item.title: Acer launches 40th Ryzen AI Max+ 395 system as it pitches Veriton RA100 mini PC as an AI workstation — but unless it is keenly priced, it will struggle against better value competitors
item.description: Acer targets creators and developers building and running local models with its Veriton RA100 Ryzen AI Max+ 395 mini PC.

item.title: I've looked at every Samsung Galaxy S26 price and release date rumor so far — here's what I think will happen
item.description: I've predicted the announcement, pre-order, and on-sale dates for the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, along with the possible prices.

item.title: Facture d’électricité : une (petite) baisse automatique confirmée pour le 1er février, voici ce que vous allez gagner
item.description: Une baisse automatique sera bientôt appliquée sur les factures d’électricité en France. Le gouvernement a en effet décidé de réduire l’une des taxes qui les alourdissent. Une bonne nouvelle pour commencer l’année, certes, mais dont l’impact restera limité.

item.title: On a pris en main les batteries solaires et les piles rechargeables en USB-C de Marstek : un prix qui promet de défier la concurrence
item.description: Le fabricant chinois de batteries, Marstek, dévoile au CES 2026 trois produits, dont un très intéressant. Une batterie solaire compacte, puissante et plutôt abordable. Nous étions sur place, voici notre premier avis.

item.title: Ecovacs wants to make self-clean window-bots happen, but I don't think they're going to happen
item.description: I'm not sure my window bot really needs its own tiny washing machine.

item.title: Meta Is Making a Big Bet on Nuclear With Oklo
item.description: Meta will finance Oklo’s purchase of uranium for its reactors. It’s a massive vote of confidence for both the startup and nuclear power, but challenges remain.

item.title: The older but still excellent Garmin Vivoactive 5 tumbles to a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The Garmin Vivoactive 5 crashes to $184.99 at Amazon, making it an excellent buy if you're after a cheap running watch.

item.title: This semi-secret Lego Smart Brick feature gives it even more potential
item.description: We just gave the Lego Smart Brick our Best In Show award at CES 2026, and I wanted to stop by The Lego Group's suite to get a last glimpse before I left Las Vegas. To my surprise, the company showed off one more feature I didn't see during my first demo, perhaps the most […]

item.title: Monarch Money's budgeting app is 50 percent off for new users
item.description: A new year is the perfect time to get your spending in order, and if you're not trying to build your own spreadsheet, budgeting apps are one of the best ways to do it. To save yourself some money in the process, you can pick up a year-long subscription to Monarch Money, one of Engadget's favorite budgeting apps, for just $50 if you use code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout and you're a new subscriber. That's a 50 percent discount on the service's normal $100 price. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, a...

item.title: Tesla baisse le prix de la Model 3 jusqu’au 31 mars 2026 : moins de 33 400 €, c’est du jamais vu
item.description: La stratégie de Tesla est prévisible, mais elle fonctionne toujours. Pour gonfler ses chiffres du premier trimestre 2026, Elon Musk brade la Model 3. 3500 € de réduction immédiate. Une aubaine pour les acheteurs, un cauchemar pour ceux qui ont acheté le mois dernier.

item.title: Did you know that Gmail has emoji reactions?
item.description: Google rolled out emoji reactions to personal Gmail accounts a little over two years ago, and I completely forgot about it until now - probably because the option is hidden within a small, smiley face icon beside the Forward button. But now, Google is bringing emoji reactions to all Workspace users by default on February […]

item.title: North Korean hackers using malicious QR codes in spear phishing, FBI warns
item.description: Kimsuky's latest attacks can bypass email protections and MFA to steal M365 and VPN accounts.

item.title: The era of 6K monitors has come: after Dell, Acer launches another 20-megapixel screen — 32-inch PE320QX has 7 ports and a webcam but no KVM
item.description: Acer’s new ProDesigner PE320QX monitor packs real 6K resolution in a 32-inch display with a generous selection of ports.

item.title: Scenes from the anti-ICE march in New York City
item.description: On Thursday evening in Manhattan's Financial District, hundreds of protesters braved the cold to protest US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), after an agent fatally shot a woman at close range on Wednesday. Earlier that day, Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem's visit to One World Trade Center in Lower Manhattan sparked protests outside […]...

item.title: Weight Loss Drugs Like Zepbound Could Help Treat Arthritis, Trial Shows
item.description: People who took both Zepbound and an anti-inflammatory drug saw a greater improvement of their psoriatic arthritis symptoms.

item.title: Versions of ‘Golden’ Will Continue Until Morale Improves
item.description: 'KPop Demon Hunters' will make fans wait for merch and a sequel, but its breakout bop now has even more alternate versions available.

item.title: Bill Gates funds many green energy tech solutions, but he says true climate action really needs this to succeed
item.description: In his annual look-ahead letter, the billionaire and philanthropist warns that markets alone can’t save the planet. As President Trump takes even more steps to pull back on climate action, Bill Gates is emphasizing how governmental policies are crucial to addressing climate change.

item.title: GM to take $6 billion charge after EV pullback
item.description: GM’s previous goal was to make the vast majority of the vehicles electric by 2035, and the entire company carbon neutral five years after that. General Motors will be hit with charges of about $6 billion as sales of electric vehicles sputter after the U.S. cut tax incentives to buy them and also eased auto emissions standards.

item.title: J’ai vu les futurs TV NXTVision Art Life de TCL, des téléviseurs qui se font passer pour des tableaux
item.description: Présenté comme un téléviseur artistique haut de gamme, le TCL A400 Pro associe design type tableau et technologie QD‑Mini LED. Annoncé d’abord en Chine, il occupe une place de choix sur le stand TCL au CES 2026 de Las Vegas avant d’arriver en France.

item.title: Peach Bowl 2026 Free Streams: Watch Oregon vs Indiana, TV Channels, Preview
item.description: As the Oregon Ducks and Indiana Hoosiers go head-to-head in Atlanta, Georgia, here's how to watch Peach Bowl 2026 for free and from anywhere in the world.

item.title: World’s Richest Man Says Don’t Bother Saving for Retirement
item.description: "We're in the singularity. We're at the top of the roller coaster, and it's about to go down."

item.title: I tried a shockingly affordable 9.2.6-channel Dolby Atmos surround soundbar — and it's instantly addictive
item.description: This elite soundbar offers real side surrounds and huge bass for smaller spaces, and with an astounding early bird price

item.title: The Morning After: The best of CES 2026
item.description: We’re wrapping up coverage of the biggest tech show in the world. CES 2026 is almost over, and while we have more stories and wrap-ups to come, here are the most interesting products we’ve spotted, written about and critiqued/praised. That includes our picks for the best of CES. We gave out 15 awards as well as our best of show, and you might be surprised by some of our picks — I know I was. Read on for some of the best things to come out of Las Vegas this week, but first up, our Best of the Best winner, which was Lego Smart Play. As Engadget’s editor-in-chief Aaron Souppouris put it, “Lego co...

item.title: ICE Agent’s Cellphone Video of Renee Good’s Killing Leaks to Right-Wing Outlet
item.description: Shots were fired just 40 seconds after the ICE agent left his vehicle.

item.title: Ikea Smartened Up Some of Its Artsy-Fartsy Lights
item.description: The Swedish meatball restaurant now sells RGB donut-shaped lamps and bendy dimmable pendant lamps with smart home functionality.

item.title: How the Sleepbuds maker, Ozlo, is building a platform for sleep data
item.description: Ozlo Sleepbuds are going to have a big year, with new products, AI features, and more.

item.title: 'It's just a matter of time': Asus suggests integrated GPUs could be the future for gaming laptops sooner than you think
item.description: Ready for integrated graphics to take over from discrete GPUs? Asus believes 'it's just a matter of time' now.

item.title: Unemployment falls to 4.4% in December, closing out a frustrating year for job seekers
item.description: The unemployment rate slipped to 4.4%, its first decline since June, from 4.5% in November. Sluggish December hiring concluded a year of weak employment gains that have frustrated job seekers even though layoffs and unemployment remained low.
